WorkflowInfo.Name: Start Windows firewall
WorkflowInfo.Description: Start Windows firewall and set the service startup type to automatic on list of servers
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:MemorySet;Assembly=MemorySet, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ServiceStatus;Assembly=ServiceStatus, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:ServiceStart;Assembly=ServiceStart, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:SetServiceStartUpType;Assembly=SetServiceStartUpType, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="Windows Firewall Report
---------------------------------------" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="Report" x:Name="memorySet1" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /><ns1:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\servers.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /><ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns4:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns5:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns6:ServiceStatus IsValid="True" x:Name="serviceStatus1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Get Service Status" ServiceName="MpsSvc" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets the selected service status." HostId="-2" TypeName="ServiceStatus" UserName="" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns7:ReturnValue Value="Running" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Running)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns8:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns7:ReturnValue Value="Stopped" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Stopped)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns9:ServiceStart IsValid="True" x:Name="serviceStart1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Start Service" ServiceName="MpsSvc" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Starts the selected service." HostId="-2" TypeName="ServiceStart" UserName="" /><ns10:SetServiceStartUpType IsValid="True" x:Name="setServiceStartUpType1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" TypeName="SetServiceStartUpType" DisplayName="Set Service StartUP Type" ServiceName="MpsSvc" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Sets the service startup type." HostId="-2" ServiceType="Automatic" UserName="" /><ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="Windows firewall has been started on %ServerName%" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="True" VariableName="Report" x:Name="memorySet2" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity><ns3:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Windows Firewall Report" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="0" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, group or duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16618"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">%Report%</BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
